text: Charlie and Lola is a British animated television series based on the popular children's picture book series of the same name by Lauren Child. It aired from 2005 to 2008. The animation uses a collage style that emulates the style of the original books. == Series overview == == Episodes == ===Season 1 (2005)=== ===Season 2 (2006–07)=== === Special (2006) === ===Season 3 (2007–08)=== === Special (2008) === == References == Category:Lists of American children's television series episodes Category:Lists of British children's television series episodes
title: List of Charlie and Lola episodes
